Meanwhile, back at the Ark . . .

Elder is sitting at the main controls, fretting over what was
happening. He could clearly see Cheetor and Ramulus working to pull
everyone out of the deep pit, with Airhammer pulling guard duty. He
had almost forgotten about that hole that Megatron had dug. They need
to fill that thing in, not telling what else could come out of it.

He glanced back at Kup, "They're about out." Elder said, his voice
excited by what was going on, but he still managed to keep his cool.
"Legacy is about to bring Rodimus in, we have Santon and Bump both
there ready to assist Legacy in the repairs."

A viewscreen showed Legacy approaching the Ark, the shield parting
slightly to allow him to enter.

The screen also showed Santon and Bump standing on the dock. Santon
was the larger, bulkier form. He was Grey with red on his thighs and
arms. Large tusk like protrusions comming from the side of his head
and heavy plating displaying clearly what his beast mode would be,
that of an elephant.

Standing just behind Santon was Bump, a smaller more compact Maximal,
colored almost in reverse of Santon, red armored frame with grey along
the thighs and bicepts. His beast mode was more difficult to discern,
perhaps some sort of reptile.

The camera view showed them both looking up at the approaching Legacy
as he was carrying Rodimus' form in his arms.

(TAG)

Preston
